channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-151] [hbase] Region split twice, once after region had closed
item.description:
Here are the log lines for the region. Was undergoing heavy load at the time.

item.summary: [hbase] Region split twice, once after region had closed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Two regions had same regionid (timestamp) and it confused me into thinking the two splits were of same region.
